TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Fetch folder name, mapping name, workflow name
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_FETCH_MAPPING_INFO

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select to_char(p.PRODUCT_ID) as CODE , p.LABEL as DESCRIPTION , pf.PRODUCT_FAMILY_NAME as FAMILY , p.PRODUCT_NAME as PRODUCT , w.WORKFLOW_GROUP_NAME as PRODUCT_SUB_GROUP , pg.PRODUCT_GROUP_NAME as PRODUCT_GROUP , p.LAST_MODIFIED as LAST_MODIFIED from $$Prefix.product p left join $$Prefix.PRODUCT_GROUP pg on p.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID=pg.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID left join $$Prefix.PRODUCT_FAMILY pf on pg.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID=pf.PRODUCT_FAMILY_ID left join $$Prefix.PRODUCT_WORKFLOW_GROUP w on p.WORKFLOW_GROUP_ID=w.WORKFLOW_GROUP_ID where p.LAST_MODIFIED > TO_TIMESTAMP ('$$last_upd_pro_date', 'YYYYDDMMHH24MISSFF')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT PRODUCT_DIM.PRODUCT_KEY as PRODUCT_KEY, PRODUCT_DIM.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_DIM.FAMILY as FAMILY, PRODUCT_DIM.PRODUCT as PRODUCT, PRODUCT_DIM.PRODUCT_SUB_GROUP as PRODUCT_SUB_GROUP, PRODUCT_DIM.PRODUCT_GROUP as PRODUCT_GROUP, PRODUCT_DIM.CODE as CODE FROM PRODUCT_DIM where (CODE, PRODUCT) in (select code, product from temp_product)

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT to_char(PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID) as PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME FROM $$Prefix.PRODUCT where PRODUCT.LAST_MODIFIED > TO_TIMESTAMP ('$$last_upd_pro_date', 'YYYYDDMMHH24MISSFF')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Update Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: UPDATE PRODUCT_DIM SET CODE = :TU.CODE, DESCRIPTION = :TU.DESCRIPTION, FAMILY = :TU.FAMILY, PRODUCT = :TU.PRODUCT, PRODUCT_SUB_GROUP = :TU.PRODUCT_SUB_GROUP, PRODUCT_GROUP = :TU.PRODUCT_GROUP WHERE PRODUCT_KEY = :TU.PRODUCT_KEY
